#summary CrusherCapture reference design platform

= Device options: =
 * H264 Baseline profile (I & P frames only).
 * Bitrate, framerate, width, height regulation.
 * Due lack of deinterlacing, image width can be 288px max (with proper aspect ratio settings), that's what "blackmagic design" guys calls full 720x576.
 * AAC Audio capture with fixed samplerate 48kHz (may be other, when set proper clock?).

= Inside device: =

_as in Crusher design, but some adc's and eeprom added_

 * USB-controller: Cypress EZ2 ([http://www.cypress.com/?mpn=CY7C68013A-56LFXC&l=1 CY7C68013A-56LFXC])
 * Encoder: Mobilygen [http://www.mobilygen.com/default.asp?contentID=20 MG1264]
 * RAM: EtronTech ([http://www.alldatasheet.com/datasheet-pdf/pdf/208058/ETRON/EM639165TS-7G.html EM639165TS-7G]), or similar.
 * Video ADC: [http://www.analog.com/en/analog-to-digital-converters/video-decoders/ADV7180/products/product.html ADV7180]
 * Audio ADC: [http://www.cirrus.com/en/products/pro/detail/P1067.html CS4265]
 * i2c EEPROM [ 24LC02].
